amendment.description: To provide for the taxation of income of controlled foreign corporations attributable to imported property, and for other purposes.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3110 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 60 - 39. Record Vote Number: 83.

Amendment SA 3110 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S4787-4788) To provide for the taxation of income of controlled foreign corporations attributable to imported property, and for other purposes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 3110 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 60 - 39. Record Vote Number: 83.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3110 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
